name: Xyra Labs
description: User friendly super-app for DeFi - Crosschain swaps & CLOB-based fully on-chain Perps
bio:
A NetMarble and Jump Crypto project, Kana Labs is building the next-gen cross-chain ecosystem of DeFi, GameFi & NFTs.
We have built a core foundation layer of aggregated bridges and blockchains on which the next-gen tools for DeFi and Gamefi would be built - an ecosystem for seamless transactions, a layer-1 for Web3 and games to bridge through.
Lastly, we have the cheapest + fastest swap rates across on our dapp. Our smart wallet features - AA (Account Abstraction), social logins and everything customised.
